Trigger.name: Guard Success
Trigger.script: local text = matches[1] feedManager(text) send("gtell ^W[UI]^R:^G".. tostring(matches[2]).. " has been GUARDED.^^")

Trigger.name: Unguard Success

Trigger.name: Asked for Guard
Trigger.script: local target = matches[2] local theText = "guard " .. target send (theText)

Trigger.name: Asked for Heal
Trigger.script: --You can change the healVar with the alias. local target = matches[2] local healVar = qolWithReldi.healWord or "heal" local theText = "C " .. healVar .." " .. target send (theText)

Trigger.name: Rescue Success

Trigger.name: atQuestmaster
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>atQuestmaster Trigger\n")
--Loop to check Banned Questmasters local questmaster = tostring(matches[2]) questing.QuestmasterLong = questmaster
enableTimer("atQuestmaster")
command = "meh"

TriggerGroup.name: newQuests
TriggerGroup.script:
--This should always be disabled, --it is activated by the timer newQuests.
--cecho("
<:red><black>newQuests Trigger
")
questing.Questmaster = matches[2] --cecho("
<:red><black>" ..varQuesting.Questmaster.. " is the questmaster.")

TriggerGroup.name: newQuestsTitle
TriggerGroup.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>newQuestsTitle Trigger\n")
questing.QuestTitle = matches[2] questing.QuestUnavail = false
if matches[4] ~= nil then questing.QuestReason = matches[4] end
if matches[3] == "Unavailable" then --cecho(" \n<:red><black> Unavailable") questing.QuestUnavail = true end

Trigger.name: newQuestsInformation
Trigger.script:
--cecho("<:red><black>newQuestsInformation Trigger\n")
questing.QuestRepeatable = matches[2] questing.QuestOptimal = matches[3]
if matches[4] ~= nil then questing.QuestFading = matches[4]
end
--Loop to check Banned Quests
if questing.QuestUnavail == false then cecho(" \n<:red><black>" ..questing.Questmaster.. " is offering the quest " ..questing.QuestTitle.. ", it is optimally for level " ..questing.QuestOptimal.. " With fading experience at level " ..questing.QuestFading) send("Quest Request " ..questing.QuestTitle) elseif questing.QuestUnavail == true then cecho(" \n<:red><black>" ..questing.Questmaster.. " is not offering the quest " ..questing.QuestTitle.. " because you " ..questing.QuestReason) end
questing.QuestTitle = "" questing.QuestReason = ""

Trigger.name: newQuestsDescription
Trigger.script: --cecho("subConsole", "<:DimGrey><black> This regex doesn't work right so it is replaced with this echo\n")

Trigger.name: newQuestsEndOnPrompt
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>newQuestsEndOnPrompt Trigger\n")
setTriggerStayOpen("newQuests",0)
questing.Questmaster = "" questing.QuestTitle = "" questing.QuestUnavail = "" questing.QuestReason = "" questing.QuestRepeatable = "" questing.QuestOptimal = "" questing.QuestFading = ""
disableTrigger("newQuests")

TriggerGroup.name: updateQuests

Trigger.name: updateQuestsTitle
updateQuestsGoals
EndGetCurrentQuestTitle
Trigger.script:
--cecho("<:red><black>Ending GetCurrentQuestsTitle") setTriggerStayOpen("GetCurrentQuestsTitle",0)
questing.QuestGoalsComplete = true for i=1, #questing.QuestGoals do if questing.QuestGoals[i] == false then questing.QuestGoalsComplete = false end end
if questing.QuestGoalsComplete == true then --cecho("<:red><black>This quest is complete") table.insert(questing.QuestsCompleted, questing.QuestTitle) elseif questing.QuestGoalsComplete == false then --cecho("<:red><black>This quest is incomplete") table.insert(questing.QuestsIncomplete, questing.QuestTitle) end
questing.QuestGoals = {}

Trigger.name: updateQuestsDescription
Trigger.script: --cecho("\n<:red><black>updateQuestsDescrition Trigger\n")

Trigger.name: updateQuestsEndOnPrompt
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>updateQuestsEndOnPrompt Trigger\n")
setTriggerStayOpen("updateQuests",0)
questing.Questmaster = "" questing.QuestTitle = "" questing.QuestUnavail = "" questing.QuestReason = "" questing.QuestRepeatable = "" questing.QuestOptimal = "" questing.QuestFading = ""
disableTrigger("updateQuests") enableTimer("completeQuests")

Trigger.name: is here!
Trigger.script: if scripter.Party == "follow" then disableTimer("hunt") scripter.On = false if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end elseif scripter.On and scripter.Kill then send("kill " .. scripter.Target) end

Trigger.name: disarmed
Trigger.script: ncom("Disarm detected, attempting to wield " .. scripter.Disarm) feedManager("You were disarmed") for i = 1, 5 do tempTimer(i, [[send("wield " .. scripter.Disarm)]]) end

Trigger.name: wield detection
Trigger.script: if tostring(matches[2]) ~= "Nothing" then local wornObject = matches[3] local bannedWords = { [[artifact]], [[glowing]], [[humming]], [[magic]], [[spiked]], [[visored]], [[bound]], [[a]], [[an]], [[the]], } local words = {} local remWords = {} for w in string.gmatch(wornObject, "%w+") do table.insert(words, string.lower(w)) end for key, word in pairs(words) do for index, banWord in pairs(bannedWords) do if tostring(word) == tostring(banWord) then table.insert(remWords, 1, key) end end end for k, v in pairs(remWords) do table.remove(words, v) end if scripter.Disarm ~= tostring(words[1]) then scripter.Disarm = words[1] ncom("Scripters Automatic Disarm detection has been set the keyword <white>" .. words[1]) feedManager("Scripters Disarm keyword has been set to <white>" .. words[1]) end end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Trigger.name: autoaction
Trigger.script: local action = matches[2] scripter.Auto = action if gagmode == true then deleteLine() end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Trigger.script: if gagmode == true then deleteLine() end

Trigger.name: party request
Trigger.script:
local pc = matches[2] if scripter.Party == "lead" then send("party invite " .. pc) feedManager("You invited " .. pc .. " to your party") end
if scripter.Party == "open" then send("party form") send("party invite " .. pc) feedManager("You invited " .. pc .. " to your party") scripter.Party = "lead" end

Trigger.name: catchup
Trigger.script: local leaver = matches[2] if string.lower(leaver) == string.lower(scripter.Leader) then scripter.dir = matches[4] catchupLeave2 = tempTimer(tonumber(scripter.Rate-1), [[send(scripter.dir)]]) catchupLeave = tempTimer(scripter.Rate,[[expandAlias("catchup",false)]]) end

Trigger.name: arrival
Trigger.script: local arriver = matches[2] if string.lower(arriver) == string.lower(scripter.Leader) then if scripter.Party == "follow" then killTimer(catchupLeave) killTimer(catchupLeave2) killTimer(catchUpLeft) killTimer(catchup) scripter.On = false if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end end end

Trigger.name: follow leader
Trigger.script: local party = string.lower(tostring(scripter.Party)) local leader = tostring(matches[2]) if party == "follow" then scripter.Leader = leader killTimer(catchupLeave) killTimer(catchupLeave2) killTimer(catchupLeft) killTimer(catchup) if scripter.Kill then scripter.Kill = false end scripter.On = false rcom(scripter.Leader) if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end end

Trigger.name: caught
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[5])==string.lower(scripter.Leader) then send("bclear",false) killTimer(catchupLeave) killTimer(catchupLeave2) killTimer(catchupLeft) killTimer(catchup) scripter.On = false if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end end

Trigger.name: left behind
Trigger.script: local person = tostring(matches[2]) killTimer(catchupLeave2) if scripter.Party == "follow" then if scripter.Leader == person then send(scripter.dir,false) killTimer(catchupLeave) catchupLeft = tempTimer(1, [[expandAlias("catchup", false)]]) end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end end

regexCodeList.string: You try to follow (.+) but they are moving too quickly\.$

Trigger.name: tactics
Trigger.script: UI.offense.Tactics = matches[2] if tostring(UI.CurrentChar2) == "Offense" then UI.UpdateLabelOffense() end

Trigger.name: brawler on
Trigger.script: if string.find(UI.offense.Tactics, 'brawler') == false then UI.offense.Tactics = UI.offense.Tactics .. " brawler" end if tostring(UI.CurrentChar2) == "Offense" then UI.UpdateLabelOffense() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You will switch opponents as opportunities present themselves\.$

Trigger.name: brawler off
Trigger.script: if string.find(UI.offense.Tactics, 'brawler') == true then UI.offense.Tactics = string.gsub(UI.offense.Tactics, "brawler", "") end if tostring(UI.CurrentChar2) == "Offense" then UI.UpdateLabelOffense() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You will no longer switch opponents as opportunities present themselves\.$

Trigger.script: local wornObject = string.gsub( matches[3], "Artifact", "<span style=\"color: red;\">Artifact<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">" ) local wornObject = string.gsub( wornObject, "Glowing", "<span style=\"color: yellow;\">Glowing<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">" ) local wornObject = string.gsub( wornObject, "Humming", "<span style=\"color: white;\">Humming<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">" ) local wornObject = string.gsub( wornObject, "Magic", "<span style=\"color: purple;\">Magicfact<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">" ) local wornObject = string.gsub( wornObject, "Spiked", "<span style=\"color: grey;\">Spiked<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">" ) local wornObject = string.gsub( wornObject, "Visored", "<span style=\"color: grey;\">Visored<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">" ) local wornObject = string.gsub( wornObject, "Bound", "<span style=\"color: teal;\">Bound<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">" ) UI.equipment.RingCount = tonumber(UI.equipment.RingCount) + 1 if tonumber(UI.equipment.RingCount) == 1 then if tostring(matches[2]) == "Nothing" then UI.equipment[1] = "Nothing" else UI.equipment[1] = wornObject end elseif tonumber(UI.equipment.RingCount) == 2 then if tostring(matches[2]) == "Nothing" then UI.equipment[2] = "Nothing" else UI.equipment[2] = wornObject end end if gagmode == true then deleteLine() end

Trigger.name: Empower
Trigger.script: if tonumber(#matches) == 12 then local empower1 = matches[4] local empower2 = matches[8] local empower3 = matches[12] UI.empowers[empower1] = ((tonumber(matches[2]) / 40) - 1) * tonumber(matches[3]) UI.empowers[empower2] = ((tonumber(matches[6]) / 40) - 1) * tonumber(matches[7]) UI.empowers[empower3] = ((tonumber(matches[10]) / 40) - 1) * tonumber(matches[11]) elseif tonumber(#matches) == 4 then local empower1 = matches[4] UI.empowers[empower1] = ((tonumber(matches[2]) / 40) - 1) * tonumber(matches[3]) end if gagmode == true then deleteLine() end

regexCodeList.string: (\d+)\s{0,4}(\-{0,1}\d+)\s{2}(hitpoints|saves|speed|warding|mana|hit roll|damage roll|armor class|regen hp|regen mana|necromantic casting|abjurational casting|alterational casting|conjurational casting|enchantment casting|divinitive casting|illusional casting|invocational casting|beguilery casting|religion casting|maladictive casting|resist fire|resist cold|resist lightning|resist mental|resist magic|resist poison|resist acid|resist holy|resist negative|resist unholy|resist disease|resist light|resist sound|resist blunt|resist slash|resist pierce|)

Trigger.name: inventory lines
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == "Nothing" then selectString("Nothing.", 1) setBgColor(getBgColor()) setFgColor(getFgColor()) replace("You are carrying nothing.") selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("UI.ItemsList") else selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("UI.ItemsList") end if gagmode == true then deleteLine() end

Trigger.script: if gagmode == true then deleteLine() end

Trigger.name: treasure loot
Trigger.script:
local treasure = {[[coin of the defiler]], [[fragment of the fallen]], [[unaligned soul]], [[(Aftifact)]], [[piece of the Goddess]], [[pulsing piece of Chaos]] }
local corpses = {[[corpse]], [[pile of dust]]}
local grabbedObj = matches[2]
local grabbedFrom = matches[3]
local isLoot = false
for k,v in pairs(corpses) do if rex.match(grabbedFrom, v) == ture then isLoot = true break
end
end
if isLoot == true then for k,v in pairs(treasure) do if rex.match(grabbedObj, v) == true then local message = "You looted some Treasure" if tostring(message) ~= tostring(UI.feedlastmessage) then UI.feedlastmessage = message echo("UI.FeedList",message .. tostring(getTime(true,"hh:mm:ssap")))
end
end
end
end

Trigger.name: exp gained
Trigger.script: local exp = matches[2] local timestamp = rex.match(tostring(getEpoch()), [[^(\d+)\.\d+$]]) local aDayOld = tonumber(timestamp) - 86400 if expPool == nil then expPool = {} end table.insert(expPool, exp .. "," .. timestamp) for k,v in pairs(expPool) do local time = rex.match(tostring(v), [[^.*\,(.*)$]]) if tonumber(time) < tonumber(aDayOld) then table.remove(expPool, k) end end

Trigger.name: ding gained
Trigger.script: feedManager("You gained a level!")

regexCodeList.string: ^You have reached enough experience to level\!$

"," .. timestamp) for k,v in pairs(dpsPool) do local time = rex.match(tostring(v), [[^.*\,(.*)$]]) if tonumber(time) < tonumber(aDayOld) then table.remove(dpsPool, k) end end

Trigger.name: taken

"," .. timestamp) for k,v in pairs(damagePool) do local time = rex.match(tostring(v), [[^.*\,(.*)$]]) if tonumber(time) < tonumber(aDayOld) then table.remove(damagePool, k) end end

Trigger.name: Prompt Script
Trigger.script: -- Any code that should happen on a new prompt line goes in here to reduce essesive triggers. --update guages with prompt data UI.UpdateGuages() --trigger chain closures setTriggerStayOpen("EffectsNew", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("NameLevel", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("AttributesSatus", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("Items", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("Defenses", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("SpellCasting", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("AffectsNew", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("InventoryNew", 0) setTriggerStayOpen("EmpowerNew", 0) --feed events based on HP if tonumber(xPrompt.hp) <= tonumber(scripter.EmergencyTrigger) then feedManager("You HP is below Emergency Trigger levels") end

Timer.name: newQuests
Timer.script:
--This should almost always be disabled, --it is activated by the timer atQuestmaster.
--cecho("\n<:red><black>getNewQuests Timer\n")
enableTrigger("newQuests")
send("Quest List All")
disableTimer("newQuests")

Timer.name: updateQuests
Timer.script:
--This should almost always be disabled, --it is activated by the timer atQuestmaster.
--cecho("\n<:red><black>updateQuests Timer\n")
enableTrigger("updateQuests")
send("Quest Current")
disableTimer("updateQuests")

Timer.name: completeQuests
Timer.script:
--This should almost always be disabled, --it is activated by the timer atQuestmaster.
--cecho("<:red><black>completeQuests Timer")
for i=1, #questing.QuestsCompleted do send("Quest complete " ..questing.QuestsCompleted[i])
end
disableTimer("completeQuests")

Timer.name: atQuestmaster
Timer.script:
--This should almost always be disabled, --it is activated by the trigger atQuestmaster.
--cecho("\n<:red><black>atQuestmaster Timer\n")
--cecho("<:red><black>Command is " ..tostring(command).. " \n") if tostring(command) == "meh" then
enableTimer("newQuests") enableTimer("updateQuests") command = "NotMeh"
end
disableTimer("atQuestmaster")

Timer.name: resizeTimer
Timer.script:
--This should be disabled by default --Get window size local main_width, main_height = getMainWindowSize() --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>sysWindowResizeEvent: ".. ResizeMan.main_width .."x".. ResizeMan.main_height .."
") --Calculate new console size local left = (tonumber(main_width) / 4) --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Left Set to "..left.."
") local right = (tonumber(main_width) / 4) --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Right Set to "..right.."
") local top = 0 --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Top Set to "..top.."
") local bottom = (tonumber(main_height) / 10) --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Bottom Set to "..bottom.."

") -- Set Main Window Size setBorderBottom(bottom) setBorderLeft(left) setBorderRight(right) setBorderTop(top) --rewrap miniconoles UI.Room:resetAutoWrap() UI.Room:reposition() UI.Group:resetAutoWrap() UI.Group:reposition() UI.OOC:resetAutoWrap() UI.OOC:reposition() UI.IC:resetAutoWrap() UI.IC:reposition() UI.Tell:resetAutoWrap() UI.Tell:reposition() UI.Who:resetAutoWrap() UI.Who:reposition() UI.ItemsList:resetAutoWrap() UI.ItemsList:reposition() UI.AffectsList:resetAutoWrap() UI.AffectsList:reposition() UI.FeedList:resetAutoWrap() UI.FeedList:reposition() --Set Main Window Font and Font Size --setFont("main", UI.Font) --setFontSize("main", UI.FontSize) disableTimer("resizeTimer")

Timer.name: StupidDps

Timer.name: Hourly Damage Report
Timer.script:
reporting = UI.reporting or false
if reporting then local sixtydamageDealt, sixtystrikes, sixtydps, sixtydamageTaken, sixtyhits, sixtydph = UI.DPSCalc(3600) send("tell autoarena Total Damage: " .. sixtydamageDealt.. " on " .. sixtystrikes .. " Strikes, for an average of ".. sixtydps .. " Damage Per Strike.", false) end

Timer.name: Soup
Timer.script: if scripter.Soup == true then send("drink soup") end

Timer.name: hunt
Timer.script: local threshold = scripter.Threshold local currentHP = xPrompt.hp local currentMana = xPrompt.mana local rate = tonumber(scripter.Rate) - 2 local target = scripter.Target local tempVar = false if not combat then if scripter.On and scripter.Target ~= "none" then if tonumber(currentHP) >= tonumber(threshold) then tempVar = true if tonumber(currentMana)>= tonumber(threshold)/2 then send("hunt " .. target, false) end else if tempVar then ncom("Scripter is waiting for mana to regen") feedManager("Scripter is waiting for mana to regen") send("\n",false) else ncom("Scripter is waiting for hp to regen") feedManager("Scripter is waiting for hp to regen") send("\n",false) end end nextHunt = tempTimer(rate,[[enableTimer("hunt")]]) end end disableTimer("hunt")

Timer.name: offauto
Timer.script: local command = scripter.OffAuto local rate = scripter.OffRate if scripter.On and tostring(command) ~= "none" then send(command) end disableTimer("offauto") tempTimer(rate,[[enableTimer("offauto")]])

Timer.name: pledge
Timer.script: local pledge = scripter.Pledge or "none" if scripter.On and tostring(pledge) ~= "none" then if string.lower(tostring(pledge)) == "yakone" then local mana = xPrompt.mana if mana > 60 then send("cast resan") else send("cast renovi") end else send("cast " .. pledge) end end

Timer.name: catchupFailsafe
Timer.script: if scripter.Party == "follow" then expandAlias("catchup",false) end

Timer.name: HourlyReport
Timer.script: local total = expPerTerm(3600) local dings = math.floor(tonumber(total) / 100000) feedManager("Hourly exp report: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).")

Timer.name: failsafe
Timer.script: -- makes sure scripter doesn't fall idle by not knowinig if your in combat or not combat = false enableTimer("hunt")

Alias.name: UITheme custom
Alias.script: local color1 = matches[15] local color2 = matches[16] local color3 = matches[17] local matched1 = false local matched2 = false local matched3 = false local message = "Error: " for k, v in pairs(UI.colors) do if string.lower(color1) == string.lower(v) then matched1 = true color1 = tostring(v) end if string.lower(color2) == string.lower(v) then matched2 = true color2 = tostring(v) end if string.lower(color3) == string.lower(v) then matched3 = true color3 = tostring(v) end end if matched1 == false or matched2 == false or matched3 == false then if matched1 == false then message = tostring(message) .. tostring(color1) .. ", " end if matched2 == false then message = tostring(message) .. tostring(color2) .. ", " end if matched3 == false then message = tostring(message) .. tostring(color3) .. ", " end message = tostring(message) .. "-is invalid, Check your selections and try again." ncom(message) else UI.ThemeCustom(color1, color2, color3) end

Alias.name: UITheme theme
Alias.script:
local theme = string.lower(matches[9]) if tostring(theme) == "custom" then ncom("Syntax: <white>UITheme Custom \<color1\> \<color2\> \<color3\>") echo("
") cecho("
<DarkSlateGrey> for available colors enter <white>UIColors") cecho("
<DarkSlateGrey> There are three rules to test if a color will work.") cecho( "
<DarkSlateGrey> Rule 1\: If it is a two word color camel case it. E.G. DarkBlue" ) cecho( "
<DarkSlateGrey> Rule 2\: If it is a one word color leave it all lowercase. E.G. blue" ) cecho("
<DarkSlateGrey> Rule 3\: If it has an underscore remove it and follow rule 1.") else UI.Theme(theme) end

"\n <grey>" .. v .. "<FloralWhite>, " else message = tostring(message) .. "\n <" .. v .. ">" .. v .. "<FloralWhite>, " end else if tostring(v) == "black" then message = tostring(message) .. "<grey>" .. v .. "<FloralWhite>, " else message = tostring(message) .. "<" .. v .. ">" .. v .. "<FloralWhite>, " end end end ncom(message)

Alias.name: UIPrompt prompt
Alias.script: local prompt = string.lower(matches[10]) if tostring(prompt) == "noax" then send( "prompt %c^rHP %h ^bMana %m ^gMove %v ^yExp %X^o, ^wStyle:^o %C^w Room:^o %r ^wExits:^o %e%c^^" ) elseif tostring(prompt) == "marcho" then send( "prompt %c^rHEALTH %h ^bMANA %m ^gMVM %v ^wSTIL ^o%C ^yXP %X ^wDirections ^o%e ^wHungry ^o%B %c^^" ) elseif tostring(prompt) == "obsc" then send("prompt %c^w<^r%hhp ^b%mmn ^g%vmv^w> <^o%t^w> <^o%C^w> <^y%X^w>%c^^") elseif tostring(prompt) == "newbie" then send("prompt %c^w<^r%h^r/ hp ^b%m/ m ^g%v/ mv^w> [^y%X^w]%c^^") elseif tostring(prompt) == "all" then send("prompt %c^w<^r%hhp ^b%mm ^g%vmv^w>%c^^") elseif tostring(prompt) == "creation" then send("prompt %c^r%h Life ^b%m Mana ^g%v Moves^o,^y%X XP/lvl^o>%c^^") else ncom(tostring(prompt) .. " -is invalid, Check your selections and try again.") end

Alias.name: UISession reset
Alias.script: local reset = matches[11] if string.lower(reset) == "reset" then UI.Session = getTime() ncom("Session timer reset") feedManager("Session timer reset") if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Feed" then UI.UpdateLabelFeed() end else ncom("Syntax: <white>UISession\<reset\>") end

Alias.name: Report
Alias.script: ncom("Syntax: <white>Report \<Min\|Hour\|Session\|time in seconds\>")

Alias.name: Report argWord
Alias.script: local term = matches[8] local total = 0 local dings = 0 if string.lower(term) == "min" then term = 60 total = expPerTerm(term) dings = math.floor(tonumber(total) / 100000) ncom("Minute exp report: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).") feedManager("Minute exp report: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).") elseif string.lower(term) == "hour" then term = 3600 total = expPerTerm(term) dings = math.floor(tonumber(total) / 100000) ncom("Hourly exp report: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).") feedManager("Hourly exp report: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).") elseif string.lower(term) == "session" then local now = math.floor(getEpoch()) local session = tonumber(now) - tonumber(UI.SessionEpoch) if tonumber(session) >= 86400 then session = 86400 end term = session total = expPerTerm(term) dings = math.floor(tonumber(total) / 100000) ncom("Session exp report: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).") feedManager("Session exp report: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).") end

" dings\).") feedManager("Over " .. tostring(term) .. " seconds: " .. total .. "exp \(" .. dings .. " dings\).")

Alias.name: scripterOn
Alias.script: if scripter.On == true then ncom("Scripter is already <white>ON") else scripter.On = true ncom("Scripter is now <white>ON") feedManager("Scripter is now <white>ON") combat = false enableTimer("hunt") enableTimer("HourlyReport") end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Alias.name: scripterOff

Alias.name: scripterKill On|Off

"\n <white>" .. v .. "<DarkSlateGrey>, " else message = tostring(message) .. "<white>" .. v .. "<DarkSlateGrey>, " end end echo("\n") ncom(message)

Alias.name: scripterTarget area
Alias.script: local area = matches[14] local matched = false for k, v in pairs(scripter.allowedAreas) do if tostring(v) == tostring(area) then scripter.Area = area scripter.Target = area ncom("Scripter area set to <white>" .. area) feedManager("Scripter area set to <white>" .. area) matched = true break end end if matched == false then ncom("Unknown area input, try again.") end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Alias.name: scripterRate
Alias.script: ncom("Syntax: <white>scripterRate \<number of seconds\>")

Alias.name: scripterRate arg
Alias.script: local rate = matches[14] scripter.Rate = rate ncom("Scripter rate set to <white>" .. rate) feedManager("Scripter rate set to <white>" .. rate) if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Alias.name: scripterRate
Alias.script: ncom("Syntax: <white>scripterOffRate \<number of seconds\>")

Alias.name: scripterRate arg
Alias.script: local rate = matches[17] scripter.OffRate = rate ncom("Scripter offrate set to <white>" .. rate) feedManager("Scripter offrate set to <white>" .. rate) if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Alias.name: scripterPledge
Alias.script: ncom("Syntax: <white>scripterPledge \<pledge spell\>")

Alias.name: scripterPledge arg
Alias.script:
local pledge = matches[16] if string.lower(pledge) == "saepir" then scripter.Pledge = string.lower(pledge) ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) feedManager("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) elseif string.lower(pledge) == "prosel" then scripter.Pledge = string.lower(pledge) ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) feedManager("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) elseif string.lower(pledge) == "excind" then scripter.Pledge = string.lower(pledge) ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) feedManager("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) elseif string.lower(pledge) == "renovi" then scripter.Pledge = string.lower(pledge) ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) feedManager("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) elseif string.lower(pledge) == "obcilla" then scripter.Pledge = string.lower(pledge) ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) feedManager("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) elseif string.lower(pledge) == "resan" then scripter.Pledge = string.lower(pledge) ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) feedManager("Scripter pledge set to <white>" .. pledge) elseif string.lower(pledge) == "yakone" then scripter.Pledge = string.lower(pledge) ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>Yakone's Hack") feedManager("Scripter pledge set to <white>Yakone's Hack") else ncom( "Syntax: <white>scripterPledge \<pledge spell\>
 <DarkSlateGrey>use '<white>help pledge<DarkSlateGrey>' for a list of spells." ) rcom( "<white>Yakone's Hack:
 <DarkSlateGrey>Yakone's Hack requires both Resan and Renovi Spells.
 Resan if your mana is above 60%. Renovi should it fall below that threashold." ) end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Alias.name: scripterParty
Alias.script: ncom("Syntax: <white>scripterParty \<lead\|follow\|open\|off\>")

Alias.name: scripterParty arg
Alias.script: local mode = matches[15] if string.lower(mode) == "lead" then scripter.Party = string.lower(mode) send("party form") enableTrigger("party request") disableTrigger("party offer") enableTrigger("party follow") disableTrigger("party beckon") ncom("Scripter party set to <white>Lead") feedManager("Scripter party set to <white>Lead") elseif string.lower(mode) == "open" then scripter.Party = string.lower(mode) scripter.Kill = false scripter.Target = "none" enableTrigger("party offer") enableTrigger("party request") enableTrigger("party beckon") enableTrigger("party follow") ncom("Scripter party set to <white>Open") feedManager("Scripter party set to <white>Open") elseif string.lower(mode) == "follow" then scripter.Party = string.lower(mode) scripter.Kill = false scripter.Target = "none" enableTrigger("party offer") disableTrigger("party request") enableTrigger("party beckon") disableTrigger("party follow") ncom("Scripter party set to <white>Follow") feedManager("Scripter party set to <white>Follow") elseif string.lower(mode) == "off" then scripter.Party = string.lower(mode) disableTrigger("party request") disableTrigger("party offer") disableTrigger("party follow") disableTrigger("party beckon") ncom("Scripter pledge set to <white>Off") feedManager("Scripter party set to <white>Off") else ncom("Syntax: <white>scripterParty \<lead\|follow\|open\|off\>") end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Alias.name: catchup
Alias.script: enableTimer("hunt") local partyLeader = string.gsub(tostring(UI.party.Leader), "\'s","") local scripterTarget = tostring(scripter.Target) local Party = tostring(scripter.Party) if string.lower(Party) == "follow" then scripter.Rate = 3 if scripter.On == false then scripter.On = true end if string.lower(scripterTarget) == "none" then scripter.Target = partyLeader end if scripter.Kill then scripter.Kill = false end end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() end

Alias.name: resolve
Alias.script: if combat then send("resolve",false) else resolveTimer = tempTimer(1, [[expandAlias("resolve",false)]]) end

Alias.name: resolve arg
Alias.script: local arg = string.lower(tostring(matches[9])) if arg == "on" then enableAlias("resolve") enableTimer("qolFailsafe") enableTrigger("resolve") rcom("Auto resolve is now <white>On") feedManager("Auto resolve is now <white>On") qolWithReldi.Resolving = true elseif arg == "off" then disableAlias("resolve") rcom("Auto resolve is now <white>Off") feedManager("Auto resolve is now <white>Off") qolWithReldi.Resolving = false else rcom( "Syntax: <white>Resolve <on|off>\n <DarkSlateGrey>use '<white>help resolve<DarkSlateGrey>' to learn what it does." ) end

Alias.name: trance
Alias.script: send("trance",false)

Alias.name: trance arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[8])) if arg == "on" then enableAlias("trance") enableTimer("qolFailsafe") enableTrigger("trance") rcom("Auto trance is now <white>On") feedManager("Auto trance is now <white>On") qolWithReldi.Trancing = true elseif arg == "off" then disableAlias("trance") disableTrigger("trance") rcom("Auto trance is now <white>Off") feedManager("Auto trance is now <white>Off") qolWithReldi.Trancing = false else rcom( "Syntax: <white>trance <on|off>\n <DarkSlateGrey>use '<white>help trance<DarkSlateGrey>' to learn what it does." ) end

Alias.name: berserk
Alias.script: if combat then local class = string.lower(tostring(UI.name.Class)) local berserker = string.find(class, "berserker") if berserker then send("berserk", false) send("berserk", false) else send("berserk",false) end else berserkTimer = tempTimer(1, [[expandAlias("berserk",false)]]) end

Alias.name: berserk arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[9])) if arg == "on" then enableAlias("berserk") enableTimer("qolFailsafe") enableTrigger("berserk") rcom("Auto berserk is now <white>On") feedManager("Auto berserk is now <white>On") qolWithReldi.Berserking = true elseif arg == "off" then disableAlias("berserk") disableTrigger("berserk") rcom("Auto berserk is now <white>Off") feedManager("Auto berserk is now <white>Off") qolWithReldi.Berserking = false else rcom( "Syntax: <white>Berserk <on|off>\n <DarkSlateGrey>use '<white>help berserk<DarkSlateGrey>' to learn what it does." ) end

Alias.name: center
Alias.script: if not combat then send("center",false) else centerTimer = tempTimer(1, [[expandAlias("center",false)]]) end

Alias.name: center arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[8])) if arg == "on" then enableAlias("center") enableTimer("qolFailsafe") enableTrigger("center") rcom("Auto center is now <white>On") feedManager("Auto center is now <white>On") qolWithReldi.Centering = true elseif arg == "off" then disableAlias("center") disableTrigger("center") rcom("Auto center is now <white>Off") feedManager("Auto center is now <white>Off") qolWithReldi.Centering = false else rcom( "Syntax: <white>Center <on|off>\n <DarkSlateGrey>use '<white>help center<DarkSlateGrey>' to learn what it does." ) end

Alias.name: warcry
Alias.script: if combat then local arg = qolWithReldi.Warcry if string.lower(arg) ~= "none" then send("warcry "..arg,false) else send("warcry",false) end else warcryTimer = tempTimer(1, [[expandAlias("warcry",false)]]) end

Alias.name: warcry off
Alias.script: disableAlias("warcry") disableAlias("warcry arg") disableTrigger("warcry") rcom("Auto warcry is now <white>Off") feedManager("Auto warcry is now <white>Off") qolWithReldi.Warcrying = false

Alias.name: warcry on
Alias.script: enableAlias("warcry") enableAlias("warcry arg") enableTrigger("warcry") rcom("Auto warcry is now <white>On") feedManager("Auto warcry is now <white>On") qolWithReldi.Warcrying = true

Alias.name: warcry arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(matches[8]) if string.lower(arg) == "off" then disableAlias("warcry") disableTrigger("warcry") rcom("Auto warcry is now <white>Off") feedManager("Auto warcry is now <white>Off") qolWithReldi.Warcrying = false elseif string.lower(arg) == "on" then enableAlias("warcry") enableTimer("qolFailsafe") enableTrigger("warcry") rcom("Auto warcry is now <white>On") feedManager("Auto warcry is now <white>On") qolWithReldi.Warcrying = true elseif string.lower(arg) == "none" then rcom( "Warcry will stop yelling.\n" ) qolWithReldi.Warcry = arg else qolWithReldi.Warcry = arg rcom( "Warcry will now yell \"<white>" .. arg .. "<DarkSlateGrey>\"\n" ) end

Alias.name: QuestComplete
Alias.script:
--This trigger will try to complete all quests it can. --Syntax: "QuestComplete" for i=1, #questing.QuestsCompleted do send("Quest complete " ..questing.QuestsCompleted[i])
end

Alias.name: HeroEmpowerment arg
Alias.script:
--This trigger will try to empower the argument five (5) times. --Syntax: "HeroEmpowerment arg" local empower = matches[17] for i = 1,5 do send("hero empower "..empower) end
send("hero empower")

Alias.name: HeroEmpowerment
Alias.script: --This trigger will try to empower the argument five (5) times. --Syntax: "HeroEmpowerment arg" rcom( "Syntax: <white>HerEmpowerment <Hero Empower>\n <DarkSlateGrey>This command will try to empower that hero empower five (5) times.\n Use '<white>hero empower<DarkSlateGrey>' to see what the command accepts." )

Alias.name: partyguard arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[12])) if arg == "on" then enableTrigger("partyguard") rcom("You will now attempt to guard when asked.") feedManager("You will now attempt to guard when asked.") elseif arg == "off" then disableTrigger("partyguard") rcom("You will no longer attempt to guard when asked.") feedManager("You will no longer attempt to guard when asked.") else rcom( "Syntax: <white>PartyGuard <on|off>\n <DarkSlateGrey>Toggles whether or not you will attemtpt to guard." ) end

Alias.name: partyheal arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[11])) if arg == "on" then enableTimer("partyheal") enableTrigger("partyheal") rcom("You will now attempt to heal when asked.") feedManager("You will now attempt to heal when asked.") elseif arg == "off" then disableTimer("partyheal") disableTrigger("partyheal") rcom("You will no longer attempt to heal when asked.") feedManager("You will no longer attempt to heal when asked.") else rcom( "Syntax: <white>PartyHeal <on|off>\n <DarkSlateGrey>Toggles whether or not you will attemtpt to heal.\n <DarkSlateGrey>Use <white>PartyHealWord Arg<DarkSlateGrey> to modify the spell attempted." ) end

Alias.name: partyhealword arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[15])) local Change = true if arg == "reset" or arg == "heal"then arg = "heal" rcom("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") feedManager("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") qolWithReldi.HealWord = arg elseif arg == "revitalize" then arg = "revitalize" rcom("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") feedManager("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") qolWithReldi.HealWord = arg elseif arg == "mend" then arg = "mend" rcom("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") feedManager("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") qolWithReldi.HealWord = arg else Change = false rcom( "Syntax: <white>PartyHealWord <Heal|Mend|Revitalize|Reset>." ) end

Alias.name: partyheal arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[11])) if arg == "on" then enableTimer("partyheal") enableTrigger("partyheal") rcom("You will now attempt to heal when asked.") feedManager("You will now attempt to heal when asked.") elseif arg == "off" then disableTimer("partyheal") disableTrigger("partyheal") rcom("You will no longer attempt to heal when asked.") feedManager("You will no longer attempt to heal when asked.") else rcom( "Syntax: <white>PartyHeal <on|off>\n <DarkSlateGrey>Toggles whether or not you will attemtpt to heal.\n <DarkSlateGrey>Use <white>PartyHealWord Arg<DarkSlateGrey> to modify the spell attempted." ) end

Alias.name: partyhealword arg
Alias.script: local arg = tostring(string.lower(matches[15])) local Change = true if arg == "reset" or arg == "heal"then arg = "heal" rcom("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") feedManager("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") qolWithReldi.HealWord = arg elseif arg == "revitalize" then arg = "revitalize" rcom("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") feedManager("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") qolWithReldi.HealWord = arg elseif arg == "mend" then arg = "mend" rcom("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") feedManager("You new heal word is " ..arg..".") qolWithReldi.HealWord = arg else Change = false rcom( "Syntax: <white>PartyHealWord <Heal|Mend|Revitalize|Reset>." ) end

Alias.name: questingHelp
Alias.script: local message = [[questing commands: <white>questingOn<DarkSlateGrey>, and <white>questingOff<DarkSlateGrey>]] ncom(message)

Alias.name: questingOn
Alias.script: if questing.On == true then ncom("Now You're Questing With Noax is already <white>On") else questing.On = true enableTimer("questingWithNoax") enableTrigger("questingWithNoax") ncom("Now You're Questing With Noax is now <white>On") feedManager("Now You're Questing With Noax is now <white>On") end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Questing" then --ScripterLabel Update end

Alias.name: questingOff
Alias.script: if questing.On == false then ncom("Now You're Questing With Noax is already <white>Off") else questing.On = false disableTimer("questingWithNoax") disableTrigger("questingWithNoax") ncom("Now You're Questing With Noax is now <white>Off") feedManager("Now You're Questing With Noax is now <white>Off") end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Questing" then --ScripterLabel Update end

Script.name: UI
Script.script:
function UI.Initialize() UI.ConfigLoad() UI.Session = getTime() UI.SessionEpoch = math.floor(getEpoch()) UI.UpdateStyleSheets() tempTimer(1, [[UI.UILeft()]]) tempTimer(1.25, [[UI.UIRight()]]) tempTimer(1.75, [[UI.UIBottom()]]) tempTimer( 2.25, [[ UI.UIComms() UI.CommsClick(UI.CurrentComms) UI.UIName() UI.UINameDisplay() UI.UIChar() UI.UIItems() UI.CharClick("Items") UI.CharClick("Character") UI.UIChar2() UI.Char2Click(UI.CurrentChar2) UI.UIChar3() UI.UIAffects() UI.Char3Click(UI.CurrentChar3) UI.UIExtras() UI.UIFeed() UI.ExtrasClick(UI.CurrentExtras) ]] ) end
function UI.Initialized() if loadError == false then tempTimer( 0.5, [[ UI.booted = true cecho("\n") ncom("Everything is all loaded! For Information and Help enter \'UIHelp\'") ]] ) tempTimer(1, [[ UI.booted = true send("\n") ]]) elseif loadError == true then tempTimer( 1, [[ cecho("\n") ncom("Boot process has failed, Please check your alerts and try again.") ]] ) end end
function UI.UpdateStyleSheets() UI.StyleSheet = [[ background-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color1 .. [[; border-width: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderWidth .. [[; border-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-style: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderStyle .. [[; border-radius: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderRadius .. [[; margin: 1.5px; ]] UI.TabStyleSheet = [[background-color: rgba(45,45,45,100%); border-top-left-radius: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderRadius .. [[px; border-top-right-radius: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderRadius .. [[px; border-width: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderWidth .. [[px; border-top-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-left-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-right-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-bottom-color: Black; border-style: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderStyle .. [[; margin-top: 3px; margin-right: 3px; ]] UI.ActiveTabStyleSheet = [[background-color: Black; border-top-left-radius: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderRadius .. [[px; border-top-right-radius: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderRadius .. [[px; border-width: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderWidth .. [[px; border-top-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-left-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-right-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-bottom-color: Black; border-style: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderStyle .. [[; padding: 0px; margin: 0.5%; ]] UI.WindowStyleSheet = [[background-color: Black; border-width: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderWidth .. [[; border-color: black; border-style: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderStyle .. [[; ]] end
function UI.UpdateLabels() UI.UpdateStyleSheets() UI.Bottom:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.RTop:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.RBot:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.LTop:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.LMid:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.LBot:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.NamePlate:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) for k1, v1 in pairs(UI.CommsTabs) do UI[v1 .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) end for k2, v2 in pairs(UI.ExtrasTabs) do UI[v2 .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) end for k3, v3 in pairs(UI.CharTabs) do UI[v3 .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) end for k4, v4 in pairs(UI.Char2Tabs) do UI[v4 .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) end for k5, v5 in pairs(UI.Char3Tabs) do UI[v5 .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) end UI.UINameDisplay() UI.CommsClick(UI.CurrentComms) UI.ExtrasClick(UI.CurrentExtras) UI.CharClick(UI.CurrentChar) UI.Char2Click(UI.CurrentChar2) UI.Char3Click(UI.CurrentChar3) end
function UI.ConfigLoad() luaFiles = { [[boons]], [[boonsDetail]], [[casting]], [[character]], [[colors]], [[defenses]], [[equipment]], [[items]], [[name]], [[offense]], [[party]], [[qolWithReldi]], [[theme]], [[traits]], [[traitsDetail]], } for i = 1, #luaFiles do UI[luaFiles[i]] = UI[luaFiles[i]] or {} if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/ui/" .. luaFiles[i] .. ".lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/ui/" .. luaFiles[i] .. ".lua", UI[luaFiles[i]]) else acom("Missing Component: " .. luaFiles[i] .. ".lua") loadError = true
return end end end
function UI.ConfigSave() --needs a rewrite end
function UI.UpdateGuages() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end UI.HPBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.hp), 100, nil) UI.HPBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.hp) .. "% HP") UI.ManaBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.mana), 100, nil) UI.ManaBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.mana) .. "% Mana") UI.MoveBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.move), 100, nil) UI.MoveBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.move) .. "% Move") if tonumber(xPrompt.exp) >= 100 then xPrompt.exp = 100 end UI.ExpBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.exp), 100, nil) UI.ExpBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.exp) .. "% Experience") end
function UI.ThemeCustom(color1, color2, color3)
UI.theme.Color1 = color1
UI.theme.Color5 = color3
UI.theme.Color6 = color2
UI.UpdateLabels()
end
function UI.Theme(theme)
if tostring(theme) == "xaos" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "yellow" UI.theme.Color6 = "DarkGoldenrod"
elseif tostring(theme) == "reldi" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "red" UI.theme.Color6 = "firebrick"
elseif tostring(theme) == "blue" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "blue" UI.theme.Color6 = "MidnightBlue"
elseif tostring(theme) == "green" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "green" UI.theme.Color6 = "DarkGreen"
elseif tostring(theme) == "purple" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "DarkViolet" UI.theme.Color6 = "purple"
elseif tostring(theme) == "turquoise" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "turquoise" UI.theme.Color6 = "CadetBlue"
elseif tostring(theme) == "grey" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "LightGrey" UI.theme.Color6 = "DimGrey"
elseif tostring(theme) == "noax" then UI.theme.Color1 = "firebrick" UI.theme.Color5 = "MidnightBlue" UI.theme.Color6 = "red"
elseif tostring(theme) == "gobs" then UI.theme.Color1 = "white" UI.theme.Color5 = "orange" UI.theme.Color6 = "DarkOrange"
elseif tostring(theme) == "solious" then UI.theme.Color1 = "red" UI.theme.Color5 = "red" UI.theme.Color6 = "white"
elseif tostring(theme) == "white" then UI.theme.Color1 = "white" UI.theme.Color5 = "white" UI.theme.Color6 = "white"
elseif tostring(theme) == "black" then UI.theme.Color1 = "black" UI.theme.Color5 = "black" UI.theme.Color6 = "DimGrey"
elseif tostring(theme) == "random" then local color1 = math.random(1,#UI.colors) local color2 = math.random(1,#UI.colors) local color3 = math.random(1,#UI.colors) UI.theme.Color1 = UI.colors[color1] UI.theme.Color5 = UI.colors[color2] UI.theme.Color6 = UI.colors[color3]
else ncom("Invalid theme selection.")
end
UI.UpdateLabels()
end
function ncom(message) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - "..message)
end function rcom(message) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Reldi ]<DarkSlateGrey> - "..message)
end

Script.name: UI.Bottom
UI.UIRight
Script.script: function UI.UIRight() UI.Right = Geyser.VBox:new({name = "UI.Right", x = "-25%", y = 0, width = "25%", height = "100%"}) UI.RTop = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI.RTop", v_stretch_factor = 2.0}, UI.Right) UI.RTop:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.RBot = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI.RBot"}, UI.Right) UI.RBot:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) end

Script.name: UI.UIComms
Script.script: function UI.UIComms() UI.CommsTabs = {"Room", "Group", "OOC", "IC", "Tell", "Who"} UI.CurrentComms = UI.CurrentComms or UI.CommsTabs[1] UI.CommsHeader = Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "UI.CommsHeader", x = "2%", y = "2%", height = "5%", width = "97%"}, UI.RTop ) UI.CommsFooter = Geyser.Container:new( {name = "UI.CommsFooter", x = "1%", y = "6.5%", height = "94%", width = "98%"}, UI.RTop ) for k, v in pairs(UI.CommsTabs) do UI[v .. "tab"] = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI." .. v .. "tab"}, UI.CommsHeader) UI[v .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) UI[v .. "tab"]:echo("<center><strong>" .. tostring(v)) UI[v .. "tab"]:setClickCallback("UI.CommsClick", v) UI[v] = Geyser.MiniConsole:new( { x = "1%", y = 0, height = "98%", width = "98%", name = "UI." .. v, color = "black", scrollBar = false, autoWrap = true, font = UI.theme.Font, fontSize = tonumber(UI.theme.FontSize) - 2, }, UI.CommsFooter ) UI[v]:hide() end end

Script.name: UI.CommsClick
UI.UIExtras
Script.script: function UI.UIExtras() UI.ExtrasTabs = {"Feed", "Damage", "Party", "Questing", "Scripter"} UI.CurrentExtras = UI.CurrentExtras or UI.ExtrasTabs[1] UI.ExtrasHeader = Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "UI.ExtrasHeader", x = "2%", y = "2%", height = "10%", width = "97%"}, UI.RBot ) UI.ExtrasFooter = Geyser.Container:new( {name = "UI.ExtrasFooter", x = "1%", y = "11%", height = "87%", width = "98%"}, UI.RBot ) for k, v in pairs(UI.ExtrasTabs) do UI[v .. "tab"] = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI." .. v .. "tab"}, UI.ExtrasHeader) UI[v .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) UI[v .. "tab"]:echo("<center><strong>" .. tostring(v)) UI[v .. "tab"]:setClickCallback("UI.ExtrasClick", v) UI[v] = Geyser.Label:new( {x = "1%", y = 0, height = "98%", width = "98%", name = "UI." .. v}, UI.ExtrasFooter ) UI[v]:setStyleSheet(UI.WindowStyleSheet) UI[v]:hide() end end

Script.name: UI.UIFeed
UI.ExtrasClick
Script.script: function UI.ExtrasClick(tab) UI[UI.CurrentExtras]:hide() UI.CurrentExtras = tab for i = 1, #UI.ExtrasTabs do UI[UI.ExtrasTabs[i] .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) end if tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Feed" then UI.UpdateLabelFeed() disableTimer("StupidDps") elseif tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Damage" then UI.UpdateLabelDamage() enableTimer("StupidDps") elseif tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Party" then UI.UpdateLabelParty() disableTimer("StupidDps") elseif tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Questing" then --UI.UpdateLabelQuesting() disableTimer("StupidDps") elseif tostring(UI.CurrentExtras) == "Scripter" then UI.UpdateLabelScripter() disableTimer("StupidDps") end UI[UI.CurrentExtras]:show() UI[UI.CurrentExtras .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.ActiveTabStyleSheet) end

Script.name: UI.UpdateLabelScripter
Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelScripter() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local ON = "OFF" if scripter.On == true then ON = "ON" else ON = "OFF" end local AREA = scripter.Area local TARGET = scripter.Target local KILL = "Off" if scripter.Kill == true then KILL = "On" else KILL = "Off" end local BUTCHER = "off" if scripter.Butcher == true then BUTCHER = "On" else BUTCHER = "Off" end local SKIN = "off" if scripter.Skin == true then SKIN = "On" else SKIN = "Off" end local SOUP = "Off" if scripter.Soup == true then SOUP = "On" else SOUP = "Off" end local PARTY = scripter.Party or "Off" local DISARM = scripter.Disarm or "none" local RATE = scripter.Rate or 0 local THRESHOLD = scripter.Threshold or 0 local WIMPY = scripter.Wimpy or 0 local BUGOUT = scripter.Bugout or 0 local EMERGENCYACTION = scripter.EmergencyAction or "none" local EMERGENCYTRIGGER = scripter.EmergencyTrigger or 0 local AUTO = scripter.Auto or "none" local OFF = scripter.OffAuto or "none" local OFFRATE = scripter.OffRate or 0 local PLEDGE = scripter.Pledge or "none" local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 local FONT = UI.theme.Font local SIZE = UI.theme.FontSize local ScripterCard = {} local StatusCard = { "
Scripting is " .. ON .. "
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Area: " .. AREA .. " Target: " .. TARGET .. " Kill: " .. KILL .. " Rate: " .. RATE .. " sec
   
", }; local AutomationCard = { "
Automation
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Autoaction: " .. AUTO .. " Disarm: " .. DISARM .. "
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Offaction: " .. OFF .. " Rate: " .. OFFRATE .. " sec 
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Soup: " .. SOUP .. " Butcher: " .. BUTCHER .. " Skinning: " .. SKIN .. " Party: " .. PARTY .. "
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Wimpy: " .. WIMPY .. "% Bugout: " .. BUGOUT .. "% Emergency: " .. EMERGENCYACTION .. " (" .. EMERGENCYTRIGGER .. "%)
", }; if tostring(PLEDGE) ~= "none" then table.insert(AutomationCard, "
") table.insert( AutomationCard, "" ) table.insert(AutomationCard, "") table.insert( AutomationCard, "" ) table.insert(AutomationCard, "") table.insert(AutomationCard, "") table.insert(AutomationCard, "
Pledge: " .. PLEDGE .. "
") end table.insert(ScripterCard, table.concat(StatusCard, "")) table.insert(ScripterCard, table.concat(AutomationCard, "")) echo("UI.Scripter", table.concat(ScripterCard, "")) end

Script.name: UI.UpdateLabelParty
Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelParty() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local MinionCard={} local leader = UI.party.Leader local numMembers = #UI.party.Members local Members = UI.party.Members or {} local Minions = UI.party.Minions local MaxMinions = UI.party.MaxMinions local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 local FONT = UI.theme.Font local SIZE = UI.theme.FontSize local PartyCard = {} local PartyCardHead = { "
".. leader .. " Party
", }; table.insert(PartyCard, table.concat(PartyCardHead, "")) if Minions > 0 then local MinionCard = { "
".. Minions .. "", "", " out of ".. "", "".. MaxMinions .. "", "", " total minions
", }; table.insert(PartyCard, table.concat(MinionCard, "")) end local PartyCardMembers = { "
", "", }; table.insert(PartyCard, table.concat(PartyCardMembers, "")) for i = 1, numMembers do table.insert(PartyCard, "") table.insert( PartyCard, "" ) table.insert(PartyCard, "") table.insert(PartyCard, "") end local PartyEndCard = { "", "
" .. tostring(i) .. ":" .. tostring(Members[i]) .. "
", }; table.insert(PartyCard, table.concat(PartyEndCard, "")) echo("UI.Party", table.concat(PartyCard, "")) enableTimer("StupidDps") end

Script.name: UI.UpdateLabelDamage
Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelDamage() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local rounddamageDealt = 0 local roundstrikes = 0 local rounddps = 0 local rounddamageTaken = 0 local roundhits = 0 local rounddph = 0 local minutedamageDealt = 0 local minutestrikes = 0 local minutedps = 0 local minutedamageTaken = 0 local minutehits = 0 local minutedph = 0 local minutexp = 0 local minutedings = 0 local tendamageDealt = 0 local tenstrikes = 0 local tendps = 0 local tendamageTaken = 0 local tenhits = 0 local tendph = 0 local tenexp = 0 local tendings = 0 local sixtydamageDealt = 0 local sixtystrikes = 0 local sixtydps = 0 local sixtydamageTaken = 0 local sixtyhits = 0 local sixtydph = 0 local sixtyexp = 0 local sixtydings = 0 local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 local FONT = UI.theme.Font local SIZE = UI.theme.FontSize if not isTableEmpty(dpsPool) then rounddamageDealt, roundstrikes, rounddps = UI.DPSCalc(3) minutedamageDealt, minutestrikes, minutedps = UI.DPSCalc(60) tendamageDealt, tenstrikes, tendps = UI.DPSCalc(600) sixtydamageDealt, sixtystrikes, sixtydps = UI.DPSCalc(3600) end if not isTableEmpty(damagePool) then rounddamageTaken, roundhits, rounddph = UI.DamageCalc(3) minutedamageTaken, minutehits, minutedph = UI.DamageCalc(60) tendamageTaken, tenhits, tendph = UI.DamageCalc(600) sixtydamageTaken, sixtyhits, sixtydph = UI.DamageCalc(3600) end if not isTableEmpty(expPool) then minuteexp = expPerTerm(60) minutedings = math.floor(tonumber(minuteexp) / 100000) if not minuteexp then minuteexp = 0 minutedings = 0 end tenexp = expPerTerm(600) tendings = math.floor(tonumber(tenexp) / 100000) if not tenexp then tenexp = 0 tendings = 0 end sixtyexp = expPerTerm(3600) sixtydings = math.floor(tonumber(sixtyexp) / 100000) if not sixtyexp then sixtyexp = 0 sixtydings = 0 end end local DPSCard = {} local DPSCard = { "
Damage Output
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Last Round:" .. rounddamageDealt .. "   Strikes:" .. roundstrikes .. "   Average:" .. rounddps .. "
60 Seconds:" .. minutedamageDealt .. "   Strikes:" .. minutestrikes .. "   Average:" .. minutedps .. "
10 Minutes:" .. tendamageDealt .. "   Strikes:" .. tenstrikes .. "   Average:" .. tendps .. "
1 Hour:" .. sixtydamageDealt .. "   Strikes:" .. sixtystrikes .. "   Average:" .. sixtydps .. "
", "
Damage Taken
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Last Round:" .. rounddamageTaken .. "   Hits:" .. roundhits .. "   Average:" .. rounddph .. "
60 Seconds:" .. minutedamageTaken .. "   Hits:" .. minutehits .. "   Average:" .. minutedph .. "
10 Minutes:" .. tendamageTaken .. "   Hits:" .. tenhits .. "   Average:" .. tendph .. "
1 Hour:" .. sixtydamageTaken .. "   Hits:" .. sixtyhits .. "   Average:" .. sixtydph .. "
", "
Experience Gained
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
60 Seconds:" .. minuteexp .. "   Dings:" .. minutedings .. "
10 Minutes:" .. tenexp .. "   Dings:" .. tendings .. "
1 Hour:" .. sixtyexp .. "   Dings:" .. sixtydings .. "
", }; echo("UI.Damage", table.concat(DPSCard, "")) end

Script.name: UI.UpdateLabelFeed
Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelFeed() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local SESSION = UI.Session local CURRENT = getTime() local DAYS = tonumber(CURRENT.day) - tonumber(SESSION.day) local HOURS = tonumber(CURRENT.hour) - tonumber(SESSION.hour) if tonumber(HOURS) < 0 then DAYS = tonumber(DAYS) - 1 HOURS = tonumber(HOURS) + 24 end local MINUTES = tonumber(CURRENT.min) - tonumber(SESSION.min) if tonumber(MINUTES) < 0 then HOURS = tonumber(HOURS) - 1 MINUTES = tonumber(MINUTES) + 60 end local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 local FONT = UI.theme.Font local SIZE = UI.theme.FontSize local FeedCard = { "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Session Start: " .. SESSION.month .. "\\" .. SESSION.day .. "\\" .. SESSION.year .. " " .. SESSION.hour .. ":" .. SESSION.min .. "  Elapsed time: " .. DAYS .. "d " .. HOURS .. "h " .. MINUTES .. "m 
", }; echo("UI.FeedDetails", table.concat(FeedCard, "")) end

Script.name: UI.UILeft
Script.script: function UI.UILeft() UI.Left = Geyser.VBox:new({name = "UI.Left", x = 0, y = 0, width = "25%", height = "100%"}) UI.NamePlate = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI.NamePlate", v_stretch_factor = 0.5}, UI.Left) UI.NamePlate:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.LTop = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI.LTop", v_stretch_factor = 2.0}, UI.Left) UI.LTop:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.LMid = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI.LMid", v_stretch_factor = 2.0}, UI.Left) UI.LMid:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) UI.LBot = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI.LBot", v_stretch_factor = 2.0}, UI.Left) UI.LBot:setStyleSheet(UI.StyleSheet) end

Script.name: UI.UIName
Script.script: function UI.UIName() UI.Name = Geyser.Label:new( {name = "UI.Name", x = "2.25%", y = "11%", height = "80%", width = "96%"}, UI.NamePlate ) UI.Name:setStyleSheet(UI.WindowStyleSheet) end

Script.name: UI.UINameDisplay
Script.script:
function UI.UINameDisplay() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local NAME = UI.name.Name local CLASS = UI.name.Class local RACE = UI.name.Race local LEVEL = UI.name.Level local PERCENT = UI.name.PercToLevel local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 local FONT = UI.theme.Font local SIZE = UI.theme.FontSize local NameCard = { "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
  " .. NAME .. "   | " .. CLASS .. "
[  " .. RACE .. "  ] | Level: " .. LEVEL .. " (" .. PERCENT .. "%)
", }; echo("UI.Name", table.concat(NameCard, "")) end

Script.name: UI.UIChar
Script.script: function UI.UIChar() UI.CharTabs = {"Character", "Equipment", "Items"} UI.CurrentChar = UI.CurrentChar or UI.CharTabs[1] UI.CharHeader = Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "UI.CharHeader", x = "2%", y = "2%", height = "10%", width = "97%"}, UI.LTop ) UI.CharFooter = Geyser.Container:new( {name = "UI.CharFooter", x = "1%", y = "11%", height = "87%", width = "98%"}, UI.LTop ) for k, v in pairs(UI.CharTabs) do UI[v .. "tab"] = Geyser.Label:new({name = "UI." .. v .. "tab"}, UI.CharHeader) UI[v .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) UI[v .. "tab"]:echo("<center><strong>" .. tostring(v)) UI[v .. "tab"]:setClickCallback("UI.CharClick", v) UI[v] = Geyser.Label:new( {x = "1%", y = 0, height = "98%", width = "98%", name = "UI." .. v}, UI.CharFooter ) UI[v]:setStyleSheet(UI.WindowStyleSheet) UI[v]:hide() end end

Script.name: UI.CharClick
Script.script: function UI.CharClick(tab) UI[UI.CurrentChar]:hide() UI.CurrentChar = tab for i = 1, #UI.CharTabs do UI[UI.CharTabs[i] .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.TabStyleSheet) end if tostring(UI.CurrentChar) == "Character" then UI.UpdateLabelCharacter() elseif tostring(UI.CurrentChar) == "Equipment" then UI.UpdateLabelEquipment() elseif tostring(UI.CurrentChar) == "Items" then UI.UpdateLabelItems() end UI[UI.CurrentChar]:show() UI[UI.CurrentChar .. "tab"]:setStyleSheet(UI.ActiveTabStyleSheet) end

Stats

Faith
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Religion:" .. RELIGION .. " Caste:" .. CASTE .. " Favor:" .. FAVOR .. "

Affliction " .. AFFLICTION .. ", " .. AFFLICTIONTIER .. " for " .. AFFLICTIONTIME .. " " .. AFFLICTIONTIMEVAR .. "

Script.name: UI.UpdateLabelAffects
Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelAffects() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 clearWindow("UI.AffectsList") UI.AffectsList:resetAutoWrap() cecho("UI.AffectsList", "<" .. C1 .. ">You are affected by:
") if UI.affects == nil then return end for k1, v1 in pairs(UI.affects) do for k2, v2 in pairs(UI.affects[k1]) do local affect = k1 local stat = rex.match(tostring(v2), [[^(.*)\,.*\,.*$]]) local amount = rex.match(tostring(v2), [[^.*\,(.*)\,.*$]]) local timer = rex.match(tostring(v2), [[^.*\,.*\,(.*)$]]) if tonumber(k2) == 1 then local line = "<" .. C1 .. ">" .. affect .. " " .. stat .. " " .. amount .. ", " .. timer .. "
" cecho("UI.AffectsList", line) else local line = " " .. stat .. " " .. amount .. ", " .. timer .. "
" cecho("UI.AffectsList", line) end end end end

Script.name: Feed
Script.script:
function feedManager(message) if lastMessage == nil then lastMessage = "None" end if lastTimestamp == nil then timestamp = getTime(true, "hh:mm:ssap") end local timestamp = getTime(true, "hh:mm:ssap") local console = "UI.FeedList" if message ~= lastMessage or timestamp ~= lastTimestamp then cecho(console, message .. "<DimGrey> @" .. timestamp .. "\n") lastMessage = message lastTimestamp = timestamp end end
function expPerTerm(term) local newTime = getEpoch() local inScopeExp = {} local total = 0 for k,v in pairs(expPool) do local exp = rex.match(tostring(v), [[^(.*)\,.*$]]) local time = rex.match(tostring(v), [[^.*\,(.*)$]]) local minTime = tonumber(newTime) - tonumber(term) local maxTime = newTime if tonumber(time) <= tonumber(maxTime) and tonumber(time) >= tonumber(minTime) then table.insert(inScopeExp, exp) end end for k, v in pairs(inScopeExp) do total = tonumber(total) + tonumber(v) end if isStringEmpty(tostring(total)) then total = 0 end return total end function isStringEmpty(s) return s == nil or s == '' end function isTableEmpty(s) local next = next if next(s) == nil then return true end return false end

Script.name: UI.DamageCalc
Script.script:
function UI.DamageCalc(term) if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local dph = 0 local hits = 0 local damageTaken = 0 local DAMAGEPOOL = damagePool or {} if not isTableEmpty(DAMAGEPOOL) then damageTaken, hits = UI.xPerTerm(DAMAGEPOOL, term) dph = tonumber(string.format("%.3f", (tonumber(damageTaken)/tonumber(hits)))) or 0 end if isStringEmpty(tostring(dph)) then dph = 0 end
if isStringEmpty(tostring(hits)) then hits = 0 end if isStringEmpty(tostring(damageTaken)) then damageTaken = 0 end return damageTaken, hits, dph end

Script.name: UI.DPSCalc
Script.script:
function UI.DPSCalc(term) if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local dps = 0 local strikes = 0 local damageDealt = 0 local DPSPOOL = dpsPool or {}
if not isTableEmpty(DPSPOOL) then damageDealt, strikes = UI.xPerTerm(DPSPOOL, term) dps = tonumber(string.format("%.3f", (tonumber(damageDealt)/tonumber(strikes)))) or 0 end if isStringEmpty(tostring(dps)) then dps = 0 end if isStringEmpty(tostring(strikes)) then strikes = 0 end if isStringEmpty(tostring(damageDealt)) then damageDealt = 0 end return damageDealt, strikes, dps end

Script.name: UI.xPerTerm
Script.script:
function UI.xPerTerm(tempTable,term) local newTime = getEpoch() local inScope = {} local total = 0 local count = 0 for k,v in pairs(tempTable) do local wantedVariable = rex.match(tostring(v), [[^(.*)\,.*$]]) local time = rex.match(tostring(v), [[^.*\,(.*)$]]) local minTime = tonumber(newTime) - tonumber(term) local maxTime = newTime if tonumber(time) <= tonumber(maxTime) and tonumber(time) >= tonumber(minTime) then table.insert(inScope, wantedVariable) count = count + 1 end end for k, v in pairs(inScope) do total = tonumber(total) + tonumber(v) end
return total, count end
function round(x) return x>=0 and math.floor(x+0.5) or math.ceil(x-0.5) end

Script.name: xPrompt
Script.script:
function xPrompt.Initialize() xPrompt.ConfigLoad() end
function xPrompt.ConfigLoad() local path = profilePath .. "/ui/xPrompt.lua" if io.exists(path) then table.load(path, xPrompt) else ncom("Missing Component: /xPrompt.lua") loadError = true return end end
--Xaos compatible replacement for the isPorompt function of mudlet. --Function uses lrexlib to match lines from the mud with known Xoas prompts. --If you would like a prompt to be added to this function just tell Noax. --To use it set a trigger pattern type to Lua function with a pattern of 'return isXaosPrompt()'
function isXaosPrompt() --Noax Prompt Syntax 'prompt %cHP %h Mana %m Move %v Exp %X, Style: %C Room: %r Exits: %e%c' if rex.match( tostring(line), [[^HP (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Move (\d+)\% Exp (\d+)\%\, Style\: (.*?) Room\: (.*?) Exits\: (.*?)$]] ) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.exp, xPrompt.style, xPrompt.room, xPrompt.room, xPrompt.exits = rex.match( tostring(line), [[^HP (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Move (\d+)\% Exp (\d+)\%\, Style\: (.*?) Room\: (.*?) Exits\: (.*?)$]] ) return true --Xaos builtin Syntax 'prompt newbie' elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%\/ hp (\d+)\%\/ m (\d+)\%\/ mv\> \[(\d+)\%\]$]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.exp = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%\/ hp (\d+)\%\/ m (\d+)\%\/ mv\> \[(\d+)\%\]$]]) return true --Xaos builtin Syntax 'prompt all' elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\>$]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\> $]]) xPrompt.exp = 0 return true --Xaos builtin at craracter creation elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^(\d+)\% Life (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Moves,(\d+)\% XP\/lvl\>$]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.exp = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^(\d+)\% Life (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Moves,(\d+)\% XP\/lvl\>$]]) return true --Marcho's XUI Prompt Syntax 'prompt HEALTH %h MANA %m MVM %v STIL %C XP %X Directions %e Hungry %B %c' elseif rex.match( tostring(line), [[^HEALTH (\d+)\% MANA (\d+)\% MVM (\d+)\% STIL (.*) XP (\d+)\% Directions (.*) Hungry (.*) $]] ) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.style, xPrompt.exp, xPrompt.exits, xPrompt.hunger = rex.match( tostring(line), [[^HEALTH (\d+)\% MANA (\d+)\% MVM (\d+)\% STIL (.*) XP (\d+)\% Directions (.*) Hungry (.*) $]] ) return true --Obscillesk Prompt Syntax 'prompt <%hhp %mmn %vmv> <%t> <%C> <%X>' elseif rex.match( tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%mn (\d+)\%mv\> \<(.*)\> \<(.*)\> \<(\d+)\%\> $]] ) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.time, xPrompt.style, xPrompt.exp = rex.match( tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%mn (\d+)\%mv\> \<(.*)\> \<(.*)\> \<(\d+)\%\> $]] ) return true --Solious Prompt (%r)(%e)%c(%Xxp)(%t)%c(%hhp %mm %vmv) elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\((\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\) $]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\((\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\) $]]) xPrompt.exp = 0 acom("Your Prompt sucks") return true else return false end end

Script.name: uiLauncher
Script.script:
version = "2.0.0.8"
profilePath = getMudletHomeDir() profilePath = profilePath:gsub("\\","/")
downloadPath = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nsweeting2/XaosUI/master"
files = {[[/boons.lua]], [[/boonsDetail.lua]], [[/casting.lua]], [[/character.lua]], [[/colors.lua]], [[/defenses.lua]], [[/equipment.lua]], [[/items.lua]], [[/name.lua]], [[/offense.lua]], [[/party.lua]], [[/qolWithReldi.lua]], [[/scripter.lua]], [[/theme.lua]], [[/traits.lua]], [[/traitsDetail.lua]], [[/xPrompt.lua]], [[/xaosui.xml]],}
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysConnectionEvent", "eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDisconnectionEvent", "eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadDone", "eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadError", "eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysWindowResizeEvent","eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("bootUI", "eventHandler")
function downloadVersions() local path, file = profilePath .. "/ui", "/versions.lua" if not io.exists(path) then lfs.mkdir(path) end downloading = true downloadFile(path .. file, downloadPath .. file)
end
function checkVersions() downloading = false local path = profilePath .. "/ui/versions.lua" local versions = {} table.load(path, versions) local pos = table.index_of(versions, version) or 0 if pos ~= #versions then enableAlias("updateui") enableAlias("bootui") cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI is out of date, enter <white>updateui<DarkSlateGrey> to install!") cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Reldi ]<DarkSlateGrey> - To continue using the current version, enter <white>bootui<DarkSlateGrey> to boot!") else cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI is up to date, continuing with boot.") raiseEvent("bootUI") end end
function installUpdate() --if not downloading and corefiles is 5 local path = profilePath .. "/ui/xaosui.xml" disableAlias("installui") uninstallPackage("xaosui") uninstallPackage("generic_mapper") installPackage(path) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI has been installed, continuing with boot.") tempTimer(2,[[raiseEvent("bootUI")]]) end
function downloadUpdate() coreFiles = 0 downloadTimeout = tempTimer(60,function() coreDownloadFailed("timer") end) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - Downloading XaosUI, please wait.") downloading = true local path = profilePath .."/ui" --cecho("\n <DarkSlateGrey>Getting ") for k,v in pairs(files) do --cecho("<DarkSlateGrey>"..v..", ") downloadFile(path..v, downloadPath..v) end --cecho("<DarkSlateGrey>from\n "..downloadPath) disableAlias("updateui") disableAlias("bootui") end
function coreDownloadFinished() coreFiles = tonumber(coreFiles) + 1 if coreFiles == tonumber(#files) then cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI has been downloaded, proceeding with install!") killTimer(downloadTimeout) installUpdate() end end
function coreDownloadFailed(arg) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - A XaosUI component download has failed, install can not proceed.") cecho("\n<DarkSlateGrey> Reason: "..arg) end
function bootUI() loadError = false disableTimer("resizeTimer") enableTimer("resizeTimer") tempTimer(.25,[[xPrompt.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(.75,[[UI.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(1,[[questing.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(1.25,[[scripter.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(1.5,[[UI.Initialized()]]) disableAlias("updateui") disableAlias("bootui") end
function eventHandler(event,...) if event == "sysConnectionEvent" then downloadVersions() loggedin = false elseif event == "sysDisconnectionEvent" then loggedin = false elseif event == "sysWindowResizeEvent" then disableTimer("resizeTimer") enableTimer("resizeTimer") elseif event == "bootUI" then bootUI() elseif event == "sysDownloadDone" then local file = arg[1] if string.ends(file, "/versions.lua") then checkVersions() end for k, v in pairs(files) do if string.ends(file, v) then coreDownloadFinished() break end end elseif event == "sysDownloadError" then local file = arg[1] if string.ends(file, "/versions.lua") then coreDownloadFailed(file) end for k, v in pairs(files) do if string.ends(file, v) then coreDownloadFailed(file) break end end end end
